text: David Mustaine (born September 13, 1961) is an American guitarist, singer and songwriter. He is the frontman of the heavy metal band Megadeth. Mustaine was also a guitarist and songwriter for Metallica. == Early life == David Mustaine was born in La Mesa, California. His parents are Emily and John Mustaine. His father was of French and Finnish descent and his mother was Jewish. He also had three older sisters named Michelle, Suzanne, and Debbie. The Mustaine family were Jehovah's Witnesses.Bresky, Ben (August 8, 2005). Megadeth Play Israel == Personal life == Mustaine married Pamela Anne Casselberry in 1998. They have a son, Justice Mustaine who also plays guitar and has appeared in several local theatrical productions, San Diego Reader, Dave Mustaine Bio and a daughter, Electra Nicole Mustaine. In 2018, Mustaine said that his neck and spine condition, known as stenosis, was caused by many years of headbanging. In June 2019, Mustaine announced that he had been diagnosed with throat cancer. == Notes == == Other websites == * Megadeth's official website Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American rock guitarists Category:Metallica members Category:Singers from California Category:Musicians from California Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:American Christians Category:Megadeth members
title: Dave Mustaine
